item.title: Hulk's NPM Choices: corn-parser
item.author: Author
item.description: Hulk’s npm choices: corn-parser Chapter 1: Basic Information Corn-parser is an npm package that parses cron syntax, including timezones. It is available for use as an npm package and the source code can be found on Github at https://github.com/harrisiirak/cron-parser. The package can be installed using npm with the command npm install cron-parser. Corn-parser has over 2 million weekly downloads and has over 30 dependent packages. The three most famous dependent packages are:
